thetownoutplay.desc: Sets Trick Room and has 10% chance to burn the opponent.
thetownoutplay.shortDesc: Sets Trick Room. 10% chance to burn.
thetownoutplay.name: The Town Outplay

skystriker.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Raises the user's Speed by 1 stage.
skystriker.shortDesc: Free user from hazards/bind/Leech Seed; +1 Spe.
skystriker.name: Skystriker

reset.desc: This move acts as King's Shield for the purpose of Stance Change. The user is protected from most attacks this turn, but not status moves. Reduces the opponent's relevant attacking stat by 1 if they attempt to use a Special or contact move. If the user is Aegislash, changes the user's set from Physical to Special or Special to Physical.
reset.shortDesc: King's Shield; -1 offense stat on hit; change set.
reset.name: Reset

xanaskeystolyoko.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0. User raises a random stat if it has less than 5 positive stat changes.
xanaskeystolyoko.name: XANA's Keys To Lyoko

lookingcool.desc: Sets up Stealth Rock on the opposing side of the field and boosts the user's Attack by 2 stages. Can only be used once per the user's time on the field.
lookingcool.shortDesc: 1 use per switch-in. +2 Atk + Stealth Rock.
lookingcool.name: Looking Cool

lilypadoverflow.desc: Power is equal to 60 + (Number of Raindrops collected * 20). Whether or not this move is successful, the user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Raindrop had increased them, and the user's Raindrop count resets to 0.
lilypadoverflow.shortDesc: More power per Raindrop. Lose Raindrops.
lilypadoverflow.name: Lilypad Overflow

ravelin.desc: Heals 50% of the user's max HP; Sets up Light Screen for 5 turns on the user's side.
ravelin.name: Ravelin

blisteringiceage.desc: User's ability becomes Ice Age, and the weather becomes an extremely heavy hailstorm that prevents damaging Steel-type moves from executing, causes Ice-type moves to be 50% stronger, causes all non-Ice-type Pokemon on the opposing side to take 1/8 damage from hail, and causes all moves to have a 10% chance to freeze. This weather bypasses Magic Guard and Overcoat. This weather remains in effect until the 3 turns are up, or the weather is changed by Delta Stream, Desolate Land, or Primordial Sea.
blisteringiceage.name: Blistering Ice Age

whammerjammer.desc: If this move is successful, the user switches out and all field conditions (entry hazards, terrains, weathers, screens, etc.) are removed from both sides.
whammerjammer.name: Whammer Jammer

datacorruption.desc: Replaces the target's moveset with four vaguely competitively viable moves. 100% chance to cause the target to flinch. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
datacorruption.shortDesc: First Turn: Gives foe 4 new moves; flinches.
datacorruption.name: Data Corruption

bountyplace.desc: Puts a bounty on the target. If the target is KOed by a direct attack, the attacker will gain +1 Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed.
bountyplace.shortDesc: If target is ever KOed, attacker omniboosts.
bountyplace.name: Bounty Place

quickhammer.desc: Usually moves first (Priority +1). If this move KOes the opponent, the user gains +2 Special Attack. Otherwise, the user gains -1 Defense and Special Defense.
quickhammer.shortDesc: +1 Prio. +2 SpA if KO, -1 Def/SpD if not.
quickhammer.name: Quickhammer

waveterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Wave Terrain. During the effect, the accuracy of Water type moves is multiplied by 1.2, even if the user is not grounded. Hazards and screens are removed and cannot be set while Wave Terrain is active. Fails if the current terrain is Inversion Terrain.
waveterrain.shortDesc: 5 turns. Removes hazards. Water move acc 1.2x.
waveterrain.name: Wave Terrain

broadsidebarrage.desc: Hits 4 times. If one hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. This move is super effective against Steel-type Pokemon.
broadsidebarrage.shortDesc: Hits 4 times. Super effective on Steel.
broadsidebarrage.name: Broadside Barrage

radiantburst.desc: User gains Brilliant if not Brilliant without attacking. User attacks and loses Brilliant if Brilliant. Being Brilliant multiplies all stats by 1.5 and grants Perish Song immunity and Ingrain.
radiantburst.shortDesc: Gain or lose Brilliant. Attack if Brilliant.
radiantburst.name: Radiant Burst

hatofwisdom.desc: The user switches out, and this move deals damage one turn after it is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move, Future Sight, or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.
hatofwisdom.shortDesc: Hits 1 turn after being used. User switches.
hatofwisdom.name: Hat of Wisdom

buzzinspection.desc: The user gains the ability Compound Eyes for the remainder of the battle and then switches out
buzzinspection.name: Buzz Inspection

juggernautpunch.desc: The user loses its focus and does nothing if it is hit by a damaging attack equal to or greater than 20% of the user's maxmimum HP this turn before it can execute the move.
juggernautpunch.shortDesc: Fails if the user takes â‰¥20% before it hits.
juggernautpunch.name: Juggernaut Punch

fishingforhacks.desc: Knocks off opponent's item and randomly sets Stealth Rocks, Spikes, or Toxic Spikes.
fishingforhacks.shortDesc: Knock off foe's item. Set random hazard.
fishingforhacks.name: Fishing for Hacks

bleakdecember.desc: Damage is calculated using the user's Special Defense stat as its Special Attack, including stat stage changes. Other effects that modify the Special Attack stat are used as normal.
bleakdecember.shortDesc: Uses user's SpD stat as SpA in damage calculation.
bleakdecember.name: Bleak December

flowershower.desc: This move is physical if the target's Defense is lower than the target's Special Defense.
flowershower.shortDesc: Physical if target Def < Sp. Def.
flowershower.name: Flower Shower

baneterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Bane Terrain. During the effect, moves hit off of the Pokemon's weaker attacking stat. Fails if the current terrain is Bane Terrain.
baneterrain.shortDesc: 5 turns. Moves hit off of weaker stat.
baneterrain.name: Bane Terrain

kinetosis.desc: Badly poisons the target. If it is the user's first turn out, this move has +3 priority.
kinetosis.name: Kinetosis

pandorasbox.desc: Gains Protean and replaces Swords Dance and Pandora's Box with two moves from two random types.
pandorasbox.shortDesc: Gains Protean and some random moves.
pandorasbox.name: Pandora's Box

kevin.desc: This move combines the user's current typing in its type effectiveness against the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/8 of the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
kevin.shortDesc: This move is the user's type combo. 1/8 recoil.
kevin.name: Kevin

neverlucky.desc: Doubles base power if statused. Has a 10% chance to boost every stat 1 stage. High Crit Ratio.
neverlucky.shortDesc: x2 power if statused. 10% omniboost. High crit.
neverlucky.name: Never Lucky

statusguard.desc: Protects from physical moves. If hit by physical move, opponent is either badly poisoned, burned, or paralyzed at random and is forced out. Special attacks and status moves go through this protect.
statusguard.shortDesc: Protected from physical moves. Gives brn/par/tox.
statusguard.name: Status Guard

soulsiphon.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage. The user restores its HP equal to the target's Attack stat calculated with its stat stage before this move was used. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. Fails if the target's Attack stat stage is -6.
soulsiphon.shortDesc: User heals HP=target's Atk stat. Lowers Atk by 1.
soulsiphon.name: Soul Siphon

devolutionbeam.desc: If the target Pokemon is evolved, this move will reduce the target to its first-stage form. If the target Pokemon is single-stage or is already in its first-stage form, this move lowers all of the opponent's stats by 1. Hits Ghost types.
devolutionbeam.shortDesc: Devolves evolved mons;-1 all stats to LC.
devolutionbeam.name: Devolution Beam

bellyrubs.desc: Heals the user by 25% of their maximum HP. Boosts the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
bellyrubs.shortDesc: Heals 25% HP. Boosts Atk/Def by 1 stage.
bellyrubs.name: Belly Rubs

getoffmylawn.desc: The user switches out after damaging the target. The target is forced out after being damaged.
getoffmylawn.shortDesc: Phazes target and switches user out.
getoffmylawn.name: GET OFF MY LAWN!

cloakdance.desc: If Mimikyu's Disguise is intact, the user is not Mimikyu, or Mimikyu is the last remaining Pokemon, Attack goes up 2 stages. If Mimikyu's Disguise is busted and there are other Pokemon on Mimikyu's side, the Disguise will be repaired and Mimikyu will switch out.
cloakdance.shortDesc: Busted: Repair, switch. Last mon/else: +2 Atk.
cloakdance.name: Cloak Dance

lockandkey.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense stats by 1 stage and prevents the target from switching out.
lockandkey.shortDesc: Raises user's SpA and SpD by 1. Traps foe.
lockandkey.name: Lock and Key

navisgrace.desc: This move is super effective on Steel- and Poison-type Pokemon.
navisgrace.shortDesc: Super effective on Steel- and Poison-types.
navisgrace.name: Navi's Grace

forcedlanding.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. For 5 turns, the evasiveness of all active Pokemon is multiplied by 0.6. At the time of use, Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, and Telekinesis end immediately for all active Pokemon. During the effect, Bounce, Fly, Flying Press, High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, Splash, and Telekinesis are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. Ground-type attacks, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability can affect Flying types or Pokemon with the Levitate Ability. Fails if this move is already in effect.
forcedlanding.name: Forced Landing

epicrage.desc: Has a 25% chance to paralyze the target, and take 40% recoil. If the user is fire-type, it has a 25% chance to burn the target and take 33% recoil.
epicrage.name: Epic Rage

sandbalance.desc: The user uses Roar, then switches out after forcing out the opposing Pokemon.
sandbalance.name: Sand Balance

youhavenohope.desc: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP. This move bypasses the target's substitute.
youhavenohope.shortDesc: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.
youhavenohope.name: You Have No Hope!

soupstealing7starstrikeredux.desc: This move is either a Water, Fire, or Grass type move. The selected type is added to the user of this move. For every consecutive turn that this move is used by at least one Pokemon, this move's power is multiplied by the number of turns to pass, but not more than 5.
soupstealing7starstrikeredux.shortDesc: Change type to F/W/G. Power+ on repeat.
soupstealing7starstrikeredux.name: Soup-Stealing 7-Star Strike: Redux

riggeddice.desc: Inverts target's stat boosts if they have any; taunts otherwise. User then switches out.
riggeddice.shortDesc: If target has boosts, invert; else, taunt. Switch out.
riggeddice.name: Rigged Dice

cradilychaos.desc: All Pokemon on the field get a +1 boost to a random stat. The target is badly poisoned, regardless of typing. If the user is Alcremie, it changes to a non-Vanilla Cream forme.
cradilychaos.shortDesc: Random boosts to all mons. Tox. Change forme.
cradilychaos.name: Cradily Chaos

frostywave.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
frostywave.name: Frosty Wave

kinggirigirislash.desc: Removes the opponent's Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, and Safeguard. Secondary effect depends on the user's secondary typing: Psychic: 100% chance to lower target's Speed by 1; Fire: 10% burn; Steel: 10% flinch; Rock: apply Smack Down; Electric: 10% paralyze; else: no additional effect.
kinggirigirislash.shortDesc: Breaks screens. Secondary depends on type.
kinggirigirislash.name: King Giri Giri Slash

randomscreaming.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. If the target is frozen, this move will deal double damage and thaw the target.
randomscreaming.name: Random Screaming

gacha.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages. If the user is Minior-Meteor, its forme changes, with a different effect for each forme.
gacha.name: Gacha

skyscrapersuplex.desc: Power doubles if the target had a stat stage raised this turn.
skyscrapersuplex.shortDesc: 2x power if the target that had a stat rise this turn.
skyscrapersuplex.name: Skyscraper Suplex

landfall.desc: The foe is hit with a hurricane with a Base Power that varies based on the strength (category) of the hurricane. Category 1 is 65, category 2 is 85, category 3 is 95, category 4 is 115, and category 5 is 140. In addition, the target's side of the field is covered in a storm surge. Storm surge applies a 1/2 Speed multiplier to pokemon on that side of the field. Storm surge will last for as many turns as the hurricane's category (not including the turn Landfall was used).
landfall.name: Landfall

hydrostatics.desc: Has a 70% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage and a 50% chance to paralyze the target. This move combines Electric in its type effectiveness against the target.
hydrostatics.name: Hydrostatics

paranoia.desc: Has a 15% chance to burn the target.
paranoia.name: Paranoia

satanicpanic.desc: Exchanges places with the opponent, and then forcibly switches both. This move fails if either side has only one Pokemon left.
satanicpanic.shortDesc: Trades places with the target. Force switches both.
satanicpanic.name: Satanic Panic

thehuntison.desc: If an opposing Pokemon switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field, even if it was not the original target. If the user moves after an opponent using Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch, but not Baton Pass, it will hit that opponent before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits an opponent switching out, and the user's turn is over; if an opponent faints from this, the replacement Pokemon does not become active until the end of the turn.
thehuntison.name: The Hunt is On!

genrechange.desc: If the user is a Toxtricity, it changes into its Low-Key forme and Nasty Plot and Overdrive change to Aura Sphere and Boomburst, respectively. If the user is a Toxtricity in its Low-Key forme, it changes into its Amped forme and Aura Sphere and Boomburst turn into Nasty Plot and Overdrive, respectively. Raises the user's Speed by 1 stage.
genrechange.name: Genre Change

archeopssrage.desc: Upon damaging the target, the user gains +1 Speed.
archeopssrage.name: Archeops's Rage

cozycuddle.desc: Traps the target and lowers its Attack and Defense by 2 stages.
cozycuddle.shortDesc: Target: trapped, Atk and Def lowered by 2.
cozycuddle.name: Cozy Cuddle

blackbird.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
blackbird.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.
blackbird.name: Blackbird

gaelstrom.desc: Hits foe and phazes them out, phaze the next one out and then another one, set a random entry hazard at the end of the move.
gaelstrom.shortDesc: Hits foe, phazes 3 times, sets random hazard.
gaelstrom.name: Gaelstrom

topbins.desc: Has a 20% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to cause the target to flinch.
topbins.shortDesc: 20% chance to burn. 10% chance to flinch.
topbins.name: Top Bins

kingstrident.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack by 1 stage and Speed by 2 stages.
kingstrident.name: King's Trident

leaveittotheteam.desc: The user faints and the Pokemon brought out to replace it gets Healing Wish effects and has its Attack, Defense, Special Attack, and Special Defense boosted by 1 stage.
leaveittotheteam.name: Leave it to the team!

clashofpangoros.desc: The user restores 1/8 of its maximum HP. Target can't use status moves for its next 3 turns. Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage. At the end of the move, the user switches out.
clashofpangoros.shortDesc: Heals 1/8, taunts, lowers Atk, switches out.
clashofpangoros.name: Clash of Pangoros

kipup.desc: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. When used, if hit by an attack on the same turn this move was used, this Pokemon boosts its Defense and Special Defense by 2 stages if the relevant stat is at 0 or lower, or 1 stage if the relevant stat is at +1 or higher, and increases priority of the next used move by 1.
kipup.name: Kip Up

alphabetsoup.desc: The user changes into a random Pokemon with a first name letter that matches the forme Unown is currently in (A -> Alakazam, etc) that has base stats that would benefit from Unown's EV/IV/Nature spread and moves. Using it while in a forme that is not Unown will make it revert back to the Unown forme it transformed in (If an Unown transforms into Alakazam, it'll transform back to Unown-A when used again). Light of Ruin becomes Strange Steam, Psystrike becomes Psyshock, Secret Sword becomes Aura Sphere, Mind Blown becomes Flamethrower, and Seed Flare becomes Apple Acid while in a non-Unown forme. This move's type varies based on the user's primary type.
alphabetsoup.name: Alphabet Soup

soulswap.desc: The user copies the target's positive stat stage changes and then inverts the target's stats.
soulswap.shortDesc: Copies target's stat boosts then inverts.
soulswap.name: Soul Swap

bigbang.desc: The user loses HP equal to 33% of the damage dealt by this attack. Resets the field by clearing all hazards, terrains, screens, and weather.
bigbang.name: Big Bang

nexthunt.desc: If this Pokemon does not take damage this turn, it switches out to another Pokemon in the party and gives it a +2 boost corresponding to its highest stat. Fails otherwise.
nexthunt.shortDesc: Focus: switch out, next Pokemon +2 Beast Boost.
nexthunt.name: /nexthunt

callamaty.desc: 30% chance to paralyze. Starts Rain Dance if not currently active.
callamaty.name: Ca-LLAMA-ty

corrosivecloud.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. This move's type effectiveness against Steel is changed to be super effective no matter what this move's type is.
corrosivecloud.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn. Super effective on Steel.
corrosivecloud.name: Corrosive Cloud

rawwwr.desc: Heals the user by 33% of its max HP. Forces the target to switch to a random ally. User switches out after.
rawwwr.shortDesc: 33% heal. Force out target, then switch.
rawwwr.name: RAWWWR

spamguess.desc: Calls the following moves in order, each with their normal respective accuracy: Haze -> Worry Seed -> Poison Powder -> Stun Spore -> Leech Seed -> Struggle (150 BP)
spamguess.name: spamguess

terraforming.desc: Upon use, this move sets up Stealth Rock on the target's side of the field.
terraforming.name: Terraforming

unbind.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage. If the user is a Hoopa in its Confined forme, this move is Psychic type, and Hoopa will change into its Unbound forme. If the user is a Hoopa in its Unbound forme, this move is Dark type, and Hoopa will change into its Confined forme. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Confined or Unbound Hoopa.
unbind.shortDesc: Hoopa: Psychic; Unbound: Dark; 100% +1 Spe. Changes form.
unbind.name: Unbind

notsoworthypirouette.desc: 50% chance to OHKO the target; otherwise, it OHKOes itself. On successive uses, this move has a 1/X chance of OHKOing the target, where X starts at 2 and doubles each time this move OHKOes the target. X resets to 2 if this move is not used in a turn.
notsoworthypirouette.shortDesc: 50/50 to KO target/self. Worse used repeatedly.
notsoworthypirouette.name: Not-so-worthy Pirouette

madhacks.desc: Raises the user's Defense, Special Attack, and Special Defense by 1 stage. Sets Trick Room.
madhacks.name: Mad Hacks

technotubertransmission.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
technotubertransmission.name: Techno Tuber Transmission

wincondition.desc: Inflicts the opponent with random status of sleep, paralysis, burn, or toxic. Then uses Dream Eater, Iron Head, Fire Blast, or Venoshock, respectively.
wincondition.shortDesc: Chooses one of four move combos at random.
wincondition.name: Win Condition

omzoom.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
omzoom.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.
omzoom.name: OM Zoom

healingyou.desc: Heals the target by 50% of their maximum HP and eliminates any status problem before dealing damage, and lowers the target's Defense and Special Defense stat by 1 stage after dealing damage.
healingyou.shortDesc: Foe: heal 50%HP & status, dmg, then -1 Def/SpD.
healingyou.name: Healing you?

wistfulthinking.desc: Burns the target and switches out. The next Pokemon on the user's side heals 1/16 of their maximum HP per turn until they switch out.
wistfulthinking.shortDesc: Burn foe; switch out. Heals replacement.
wistfulthinking.name: Wistful Thinking

rapidturn.desc: Removes entry hazards, then user switches out after dealing damage
rapidturn.name: Rapid Turn

balefulblaze.desc: This move combines Ghost in its type effectiveness against the target. Raises the user's Special Attack by 1 stage if this move knocks out the target. If the user is shiny, the move's Base Power becomes 95.
balefulblaze.shortDesc: +Ghost. +1 SpA if KOes target. Shiny: BP=95.
balefulblaze.name: Baleful Blaze

submartingale.desc: Inflicts the target with burn, toxic, or paralysis, then sets up a Substitute.
submartingale.name: Submartingale

trickery.desc: Changes the target's item to something random.
trickery.shortDesc: Changes the target's item to something random.
trickery.name: Trickery

ghostof1v1past.desc: Imprisons and traps the target, and then transforms into them. The user will be trapped after the use of this move. The user faints if the target faints.
ghostof1v1past.shortDesc: Trap + ImprisonForm. Faints if the target faints.
ghostof1v1past.name: Ghost of 1v1 Past

iciclespirits.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
iciclespirits.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.
iciclespirits.name: Icicle Spirits

dungeonsdragons.desc: Prevents the target from switching out and adds Dragon to the target's type. Has a 5% chance to either confuse the user or guarantee that the next attack is a critical hit, 15% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, or Speed by 1 stage, and a 15% chance to raise user's Special Attack and Speed by 1 stage.
dungeonsdragons.shortDesc: Target: can't switch,+Dragon. Does other things.
dungeonsdragons.name: Dungeons & Dragons

clearbreath.desc: Power is equal to 60+(X*20), where X is the target's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0, but not more than 200 power.
clearbreath.shortDesc: 60 power +20 for each of the target's stat boosts.
clearbreath.name: Clear Breath

croak.desc: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0. User raises 2 random stats by 1 if it has less than 8 positive stat changes.
croak.name: Croak

swampyterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Swampy Terrain. During the effect, the power of Electric-type, Grass-type, and Ice-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon are halved and Water and Ground types heal 1/16 at the end of each turn if grounded. Fails if the current terrain is Swampy Terrain.
swampyterrain.name: Swampy Terrain

triplethreat.desc: Has a 40, 60, or 100 Base Power and a 10%, 25%, or 40% chance to apply any non-volatile status aside from freeze; the status chance and base power increase for each consecutive hit up to 3.
triplethreat.shortDesc: Chance to random status. Chance&BP+ per use.
triplethreat.name: Triple Threat

psychodrive.desc: Has a 30% chance to boost the user's Speed by 1 stage.
psychodrive.shortDesc: 30% chance to boost the user's Spe by 1.
psychodrive.name: Psycho Drive

spindawheel.desc: The user uses a random hazard-setting move; burns, badly poisons, or paralyzes the target; and then switches out.
spindawheel.name: Spinda Wheel

shockedlapras.desc: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the user.
shockedlapras.name: :shockedlapras:

inversionterrain.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Inversion Terrain. During the effect, the the type chart is inverted, and grounded, paralyzed Pokemon have their Speed doubled. Fails if the current terrain is Inversion Terrain.
inversionterrain.shortDesc: 5 turns. Type chart inverted. Par: 2x Spe.
inversionterrain.name: Inversion Terrain

stonykibbles.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Ground, Rock, or Steel type, or have the Magic Guard, Overcoat, Sand Force, Sand Rush, or Sand Veil Abilities. During the effect, the Special Defense of Rock-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a special attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Smooth Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm.
stonykibbles.name: Stony Kibbles

fanservice.desc: The user has its Attack and Speed raised by 1 stage after KOing a target. If the user is a Charizard in its base form, it will Mega Evolve into Mega Charizard X.
fanservice.shortDesc: +1 Atk/Spe after KO. Mega evolves user.
fanservice.name: Fan Service

ripsei.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's current HP. If this move is successful, the user faints.
ripsei.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's HP. User faints.
ripsei.name: ripsei

witchinghour.desc: 50% chance to trap the target, dealing 1/8th of their HP, rounded down, in damage each turn it is trapped.
witchinghour.name: Witching Hour

pitchblackterrain.desc: For 5 turns, Non Ghost types take 1/16th damage; Has boosting effects on Mismagius.
pitchblackterrain.shortDesc: 5 turns. Non Ghost types take 1/16th damage; Has boosting effects on Mismagius.
pitchblackterrain.name: Pitch Black Terrain

integeroverflow.desc: This move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
integeroverflow.shortDesc: Physical if user's Atk > Sp. Atk. Ignores Abilities.
integeroverflow.name: Integer Overflow

mode5offensive.desc: This move hits three times. Every hit has a 20% chance to drop the target's SpD by 1 stage.
mode5offensive.name: Mode [5: Offensive]

mode7defensive.desc: This move cures the user's party of all status conditions, and then forces the target to switch to a random ally.
mode7defensive.name: Mode [7: Defensive]

homunculussvanity.desc: Raises the Special Attack of the user, and either Defense or Special Defense randomly, by 1 stage.
homunculussvanity.shortDesc: Gives +1 SpA and +1 Def or SpD
homunculussvanity.name: Homunculus's Vanity

tsukuyomi.desc: The user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected. Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
tsukuyomi.shortDesc: Curses the target for 1/2 HP and traps it.
tsukuyomi.name: Tsukuyomi

badopinion.desc: Forces the opponent out. The user's Defense is raised by 1 stage upon hitting.
badopinion.name: Bad Opinion

legendaryswordsman.desc: If the move hits, the user gains +1 Speed. This move deals not very effective damage to Flying-type Pokemon. This move fails if the target does not intend to attack.
legendaryswordsman.shortDesc: +1 Spe on hit. Fails if target doesn't attack.
legendaryswordsman.name: Legendary Swordsman

shadeuppercut.desc: This move ignores type effectiveness, substitutes, and the opposing side's Reflect, Light Screen, Safeguard, Mist and Aurora Veil.
shadeuppercut.name: Shade Uppercut

updraft.desc: Changes target's secondary typing to Flying for 2-5 turns unless the target is Ground-type or affected by Ingrain. This move cannot miss in rain.
updraft.name: Updraft

tempestterrain.desc: Heals Electric types for 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. Causes Flying- and Steel-types and Levitate users to lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn; if the Pokemon is also Electric-type, they only get the healing effect.
tempestterrain.shortDesc: Heals Electrics. Hurts Flyings and Steels.
tempestterrain.name: Tempest Terrain

imtoxicyoureslippinunder.desc: This move uses the target's Special Defense to calculate damage (like Foul Play). This move is neutrally effective against Steel-types.
imtoxicyoureslippinunder.shortDesc: Uses foe's SpD as user's Atk. Hits Steel.
imtoxicyoureslippinunder.name: I'm Toxic You're Slippin' Under

veto.desc: If the user's stats was raised on the previous turn, double power and gain +1 priority.
veto.shortDesc: If stat raised last turn: x2 power, +1 prio.
veto.name: Veto

kaboom.desc: This move's Base Power is equal to 70+(80*user's current HP/user's max HP). Sets Sunny Day.
kaboom.name: Kaboom

dropadraco.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages, then raises it by 1 stage.
dropadraco.shortDesc: Lowers user's Sp. Atk by 2, then raises by 1.
dropadraco.name: DROP A DRACO

wattup.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
wattup.name: Watt Up

icepress.desc: Damage is calculated using the user's Defense stat as its Attack, including stat stage changes. Other effects that modify the Attack stat are used as normal. This move has a 10% chance to freeze the target and is super effective against Fire-types.
icepress.shortDesc: Body Press. 10% Frz. SE vs Fire.
icepress.name: Ice Press

herocreation.desc: The user switches out and raises the incoming Pokemon's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
herocreation.name: Hero Creation

soulshatteringstare.desc: The user loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. For 5 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Regenerator Ability are unaffected.
soulshatteringstare.shortDesc: Curses target for 1/4 HP & blocks it from healing.
soulshatteringstare.name: Soul-Shattering Stare

asteriusstrike.desc: Has a 25% chance to confuse the target.
asteriusstrike.name: Asterius Strike

dripbayless.desc: This move's type effectiveness against Water is changed to be super effective no matter what this move's type is.
dripbayless.name: DRIP BAYLESS

glitchexploiting.desc: 1/4096 chance to KO the target and then the user, and a 1/1024 chance to force out the target and then the user; 20% chance to burn the target, and a 5% chance to freeze or paralyze a random Pokemon on the field; 30% chance to confuse the target.
glitchexploiting.shortDesc: Has a chance to do many things.
glitchexploiting.name: Glitch Exploiting

pandaexpress.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. If this move is successful, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if the target's Attack and Special Attack stat stages were both unchanged, or if there are no unfainted party members.
pandaexpress.name: Panda Express

classchange.desc: If the user is a cosplay Pikachu forme, it randomly changes forme and has an effect depending on the forme chosen: Cleric uses Strength Sap, Ninja uses Confuse Ray, Dancer uses Feather Dance, Songstress uses Sing, and Jester uses Charm.
classchange.name: Class Change

ingredientforaging.desc: Heals 50% of the user's max HP, rounded down, if the target is holding an item. Removes the target's item and enables Belch on the user.
ingredientforaging.shortDesc: If foe has item: Heal 50% and remove it.
ingredientforaging.name: Ingredient Foraging

relicdance.desc: +1 Special Attack and, if the user is a Meloetta forme, transforms into the other Meloetta forme with its accompanying moveset, regardless of the outcome of the move. The move becomes fighting if Meloetta-P uses the move. If the user is Meloetta-Pirouette, this move is Fighting-type.
relicdance.shortDesc: +1 SpA. Meloetta transforms. Fighting type if Melo-P.
relicdance.name: Relic Dance

bigstormcoming.desc: Uses Hurricane, Thunder, Blizzard, and then Weather Ball, each at 30% of their normal Base Power.
bigstormcoming.shortDesc: 30% power: Hurricane, Thunder, Blizzard, W. Ball.
bigstormcoming.name: Big Storm Coming

luckofthedraw.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
luckofthedraw.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Speed by 1.
luckofthedraw.name: Luck of the Draw

auroraveil.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical and special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle; does not reduce damage further with Reflect or Light Screen. Critical hits ignore this protection. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Brick Break and Psychic Fangs remove the effect before damage is calculated. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails unless the weather is Heavy Hailstorm or Hail.
auroraveil.shortDesc: For 5 turns, damage to allies is halved. Hail-like weather only.

blizzard.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. If the weather is Heavy Hailstorm or Hail, this move does not check accuracy.
blizzard.shortDesc: 10% freeze foe(s). Can't miss in Hail-like weather.

moonlight.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Heavy Hailstorm, Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.

morningsun.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Heavy Hailstorm, Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.

solarbeam.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Heavy Hailstorm, Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move still requires a turn to charge.

solarblade.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Heavy Hailstorm, Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move still requires a turn to charge.

synthesis.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect or if the user is holding Utility Umbrella, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Heavy Hailstorm, Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.

weatherball.desc: Power doubles if a weather condition other than Delta Stream is active, and this move's type changes to match. Ice type during Heavy Hailstorm or Hail, Water type during Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, Rock type during Sandstorm, and Fire type during Desolate Land or Sunny Day. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and uses Weather Ball during Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Desolate Land, or Sunny Day, the move is still Normal-type and does not have a base power boost.

doomdesire.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move, Disconnect, or Future Sight is already in effect for the target's position.

futuresight.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move, Doom Desire, or Disconnect is already in effect for the target's position.
